text: Tonight We'll Dance at Home () is a 1972 Romanian comedy film directed by Geo Saizescu. == Cast == * Dem Rădulescu - Temistocle * Sebastian Papaiani - Alecu * - Mimi * Ioana Bulcă - Blonda * Stela Popescu - Stela * Margareta Krauss Silvestrini - Mary * - Alice * Violeta Andrei - Gina * - * Draga Olteanu Matei - Lacramioara == References == == External links == * Category:1972 comedy films Category:Romanian films Category:Romanian comedy films
title: Tonight We'll Dance at Home
